body:
Please call Rand64() instead:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/lib/random/random.h

It uses a static device, so won't reconstruct every call. Something like `const int64 random_ms = Rand64() % 1000`
body_html:

body_text:
Please call Rand64() instead:
